One of the cities main targets in this effort is the army of grilled food vendors in the streets. The

They argue it is based on incomplete data and is unscientific. Chinese Olympic organizers, however, say the quota attracts attention to the issue of air pollution and is a reliable method of checking air pollution. 
The city has much to gain by reaching its totals and a lot to lose by failing. The

title: Beijing Cracks Down on Kebabs to Reduce Pollution
